description:
Dot likes to keep up with pressing issues.  
Let's help Dot change the eye lights when you press the buttons!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn off all eye lights.

hints.description: Drag out an Eye Ring state. Make sure all of the eye lights are turned off. Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning off the eye lights, make Dot automatically play an FX sound.

hints.description: Drag out the FX sound and choose something for Dot to say. Link the sound with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the sound, make Dot turn on one eye light when button 1 is pressed. Then make Dot automatically play the sound again.

hints.description: Link the FX sound to the Eye Ring with one light using a Button 1 Pressed cue. Link the same Eye Ring back to the FX sound using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the sound, make Dot turn on two eye lights when button 2 is pressed. Then make Dot automatically play the sound again.

hints.description: Link the FX sound to the Eye Ring with two lights using a Button 2 Pressed cue. Link the same Eye Ring back to the FX sound using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After the sound, make Dot turn on three eye lights when button 3 is pressed. Then make Dot automatically play the sound again.

hints.description: Link the FX sound to the Eye Ring with three lights using a Button 3 Pressed cue. Link the same Eye Ring back to the FX sound using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot turn off all eye lights when the top button is pressed.

hints.description: Link the FX sound to the Eye Ring with all lights turned off using a Top Button Pressed cue.
